sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey" name="Best Practice - Task Survey Management" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="Best_Practice_-_Task_Survey_Management_Plugin" provider_name="ServiceNow" type="feature_set" invalidate_properties="true" licensable="true" license_model="producer"> <description> Enhanced survey functionality, includes triggering survey requests based on task conditions and linking survey responses to the task that generated it. This allows for detailed survey reporting leveraging data from the related task record. The demo data relies on incident and user demo data, but will not be installed with this plugin. </description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.survey"/> <import plugin="com.glide.db_view"/> <import plugin="com.glide.notification"/> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Enhanced survey functionality, includes triggering survey requests based on task conditions and linking survey responses to the task that generated it. This allows for detailed survey reporting leveraging data from the related task record. The demo data relies on incident and user demo data, but will not be installed with this plugin.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Best_Practice_-_Task_Survey_Management_Plugin</help> <id>com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Best Practice - Task Survey Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.survey,com.glide.db_view,com.glide.notification</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.bestpractice.task_survey</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>feature_set</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
